Website Hosting Plans

All of our custom-coded websites and website templates come with an incredible and easy-to-use content management system (CMS) that allows you to login, and make updates to your website with absolute ease. Even the least tech savvy people have a breeze creating new pages, editing current pages, adding/removing images, blogging, adding products, etc.

And the best part? Our website hosting plans are a set price for all website types. This means, whether you have an online shop, blog, portfolio, a personal or business website, your hosting fee stays the same. YIP! We don't charge you more if you have a shop or blog like other CMSs and hosters (if you've read their small print, you'll know exactly what we're talking about). This makes scaling your business affordable.

The CMS that we use (CloudCannon) is trusted by 40,000+ others and is also used to manage Netflix microsties. In other words, your website will be hosted on the same platfrom that Nextfix uses!

Since our websites are unhackable, we guarantee that your site will never go down or get hacked.

    FAQs

    Are there any hidden fees that I should know about?

    Nope! We believe in "what you see is what you get", and that's how we run every aspect of King Code. You will get exactly what is mentioned at the price it is mentioned for.

    Can I pay for hosting per month?

    Since all of our subscriptions are billed yearly, your swebsite hosting plan is billed yearly too. One month before your website hosting plan expires, you'll receive an email from us. You will then be reminded two weeks later, then 3 days before expiration. So you will be reminded from us plenty of times.

    Can I transfer my current hosting to King Code hosting?

    Yes, of course, and the process is pretty simple depending on your current provider. Please email us here inforning us on who your current provider is and we'll give you the instructions on how to easily transfer you domain name and hosting.

    How much does blogging cost?

    There is no additional hosting fee for blogs with our hosting plans. Our hosting fees are the same for all website types. The only difference is whether you'd like email hosting too.

    How much does an ecommerce store cost?

    There is no additional hosting fee for ecommerce websites with our hosting plans. Since we use Shopify Lite, you will be charged directly by Shopify, but as for our hosting and CMS, your plan will not increase in price. Our hosting fees are the same for all website types. The only difference is whether you'd like email hosting too.

    What is included with website hosting?

    All of our hosting plans are the best priced packages there is for all that you get! Here is a list of all that is included in each plan:

  • - 1 year of hosting
  • - Unique Domain Name (URL)
  • - Wildcard SSL Certificate
  • - Troubleshooting
  • - Content Management System (CMS)
  • - CMS Training Video
  • - Updates and additional features are charged per request

    • What isn't included with website hosting?

    Once we have handed over your website, a price for any updates or changes that you'd like can be discussed. Updates like rebranding, new designs, adding scripts, custom-code, expantion, etc are not included unless we've discussed the King Plan for you.

    What platform is my site hosted on?

    All King Code websites are hosting on CloudCannon which is actually the very same platform that as Netflix microsites. It hosts the fastest sites on the web and is recommended by over 40,000 developers.

    Can I add other features to my website?

    Yes, at a small fee, we can add any additional features to your website like Google Analytics, Google Ads, logins, hotel bookings, widgets, fonts, and anything else you need.
